target.value: 7 workshops convened for policymakers. Verbal briefings for policymakers including AU, IGAD, UN and partners

title.narrative: Policy research conducted on regional cooperation and infrastructure development for better connectivity

Number of full-fledged high-quality research study conducted and peer reviewed on regional cooperation and infrastructure development for better connectivity, Enhanced trade and regional integration; Access to improved, affordable and sustainable finance for trade and investment; and Food Security, environmental protection and resilience building

target.value: Draft four (4) research papers meeting the required standard of academic publication, on identified 4 themes. Two of these papers to be finalized

actual.value: Five (5) instead of the planned Four (4) papers were drafted (125% accomplishment). The 5th paper was on the Covid 19 health and economic impacts in the region. As planned two (2) of the papers were finalized in year 1

target.value: Refine remaining two (2) papers and finalize for presentation to the AUHIP

actual.value: Three (3) of the papers were refined in year 2, instead of the planed two (2)

Improved decision of the people on matters affecting their lives, inclusion and better representation

target.value: Adoption of a regional strategy to invigorate and implement commitments to human rights, justice and democratization including through interactions with civil society organisations within the IGAD region.

title.narrative: Developing security mechanisms in the Horn of Africa and Red Sea Arena

Development of a framework for approaching the challenges of peace and security in the Horn of Africa and Red Sea Arena for adoption by the AUHIP and presentation to the AU PSC and the Conference on Peace, Security, Cooperation and Development in the Horn of Africa.

target.value: Regular coordinated and action-oriented interaction between governments of the Horn of Africa based on evidence based policy recommendations with the aim of ensuring a functional peace and security architecture as well as democratic and inclusive governance in the Horn of Africa

title.narrative: Conduct 1 validation workshop to share intermediate findings and yield consensus on reforms among the concerned regional policy makers & other policy governance stakeholders
Validation workshop prepared and conducted with research authors and regional policy makers with expert presentation on research evidences and intensive open discussions

target.value: Workshop conducted to share intermediate findings and to yield consensus on reforms among the concerned regional policy makers & other policy governance stakeholders

actual.value: Phase II Validation Workshop on the intermediate findings of the Five (5) papers was conducted with regional policy governance stakeholders

title.narrative: Economic integration and trade enhancement, infrastructure development, addressing environmental and financial challenges

Shared understanding of the challenges and dynamics determining intra-regional trade and economic integration, infrastructure development, access to affordable finance and improved environmental protection

target.value: Enhanced regional integration, trade and investment for sustained economic growth, reduced vulnerability and better ability to adjust to climatic shocks for improved food security, and improved access to affordable finance and credit for households and firms

actual.value: The AUHIP, AU Chair, The AU peace and Security Council, the IGAD leadership and other Bilateral and Multilateral development partners have been shared with the findings on the challenges and prospects of regional integration, trade and investment for sustained economic growth, reduced vulnerability and better ability to adjust to climatic shocks for improved food security, and improved access to affordable finance and credit for households and firms. A framework document is being prepared by the Panel for the region that incorporates the findings for the AU PSC and the IGAD consideration.
